content:
A list of console variables and console commands for different Half-Life and Source powered games can be found on the developer wiki:
[list]
[*][url=https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Category:Console_Variables]Console Variables[/url]
[*][url=https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Console_Command_List]Console Commands[/url]
[/list]
title: Server Settings
